thread.title: Gmail now lets you block specific email addresses, unsubscribe from newsletters in the Android app
thread.title_full: Gmail now lets you block specific email addresses, unsubscribe from newsletters in the Android app - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Gmail now lets you block specific email addresses, unsubscribe from newsletters in the Android app
text: Google today added a new feature to Gmail that other email providers have had for years: blocking. You can now block specific email addresses in Gmail — the feature is rolling out today to Gmail on the web, and will arrive in the Android app “over the next week.” The block sender option does exactly […] »
